title: Stockholm, Gothenburg and Malmö, Sweden’s shopping destinationsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Stockholm, Gothenburg and Malmö, Sweden’s shopping destinations Published  
Stockholm, Gothenburg and Malmö is where the shopping action is in Sweden.Look out for the big homegrown department stores for everything under one roof Swedish design and handicrafts, fashion and gifts; a Swedish cheese slicer always goes down well.
 
If you are a Swedish design lover, look out for the Designtorget chain in the three cities for up and coming and affordable Nordic design.And if you are a Swedish fashion lover, check out the Acne flagship store at Norrmalmstorg in Stockholm, or the Nudie Jeans concept store at Vallgatan 15 in Gothenburg. In Malmö head for the J. Lindeberg flagship store at Södra Tullgatan 3.
